subject: ComfyUI Visual Anagrams
question: How do I install the ComfyUI Visual Anagrams plugin?
answer: You can install the plugin by cloning the repository into the ComfyUI `custom_nodes` directory using `git clone https://github.com/zcfrank1st/comfyui_visual_anagrams.git`.

subject: ComfyUI Visual Anagrams
question: Can you provide an example of how the ComfyUI Visual Anagrams plugin works?
answer: Yes, an example can be found in the plugin documentation. The workflow example is represented by the image `./sample.png`.

subject: ComfyUI Visual Anagrams
question: Is there an animate node included in the ComfyUI Visual Anagrams plugin yet?
answer: No, there is currently no animate node included in the plugin. However, it is listed as a TODO item, indicating that it may be added in the future.
